price: If you do not bring him to me, you will never receive any measure [of grain] from me, nor will you even come close to me.”
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ
